title: High Dependency on Communication Services Imports
description: In 2023, Namibia's service imports were dominated by communications and computer services, accounting for 86.19% of the total. This indicates a significant reliance on foreign technology and services.

title: Late Start for Lower Secondary Education
description: Namibia has one of the highest starting ages for lower secondary education globally, with children beginning at 14 years old as of 2023. This could impact early educational development.

title: High Income Inequality
description: In 2015, the Gini index for Namibia was 59.1, indicating significant income inequality. The highest 20% of earners held 63.7% of the income, while the lowest 40% held only 15.6%.

title: Balanced Sex Ratio at Birth
description: Namibia's sex ratio at birth was 1.011 male births per female birth in 2023, indicating a balanced gender ratio at birth.
